content: of gingerbread girl designs gingerbreadgirl@shaw ca page 2 repeat rounds 1-10 until you have just enough yarn left for the ribbing on the other end for me this was about 30 yards but don t end with round 2 3 4 or 5 the last cable crossover will just look better that way ribbing switch to the 2 25 mm needles to knit the second ribbing section repeat first ribbing section until you have about 2 yards of yarn left or your ribbing is the desired length bobble with 2 75 mm needle using your favorite stretchy bind off second legwarmer with the second of the sock twins repeat the instructions from the beginning substituting c6f for c6b in the cable section this will give a mirror image cable many thanks to my wonderful diligent test knitters lee m and jessica b any remaining mistakes are my own thank you very much to my amazing models elise and jordan i appreciate everyone s time squishy slouchy stripey leg warmers © 2020 by kathryn drummond of gingerbread girl designs gingerbreadgirl@shaw ca page 3
